title: Okay okay... Lets get this straight?
body:
I have read through all the FAQs of the VS. event. But there is a LOT of information 
there to take in.


It is my understanding, that it is possible to obtain loading screen borders for both Yasuo **and **Riven, by siding with one side earning 280 tokens, then switching to the other side and earning 280 more.
**Is this correct?**

Are there any elements that once you own the order versions, you cannot obtain the Chaos ones? _(or vice versa.)_
Or is everything fair game, as long as you get enough tokens?

_______

I will admit to being conflicted.
I wish to side with order, _(Because their stuff looks better, and the colours are nicer.)_
But as an ex-Yasuo main, I have an obligation to support Yasuo and obtain his border, incase my inner demons ever surface and I start playing him again... _(god forbid)_.

replies.body: I believe you can earn both. But you can only pick one side per day =D
